Work

Mobile App for Consumer Camping Lamp App

  • Built an iOS and Android mobile app to control a consumer camping lamp
  • Designed the Bluetooth interface and worked directly with the China-based manufactuer to complete the hardware integration
  • Collaborated heavily with a world-class design firm to refine and implement the UI and UX.
